creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: cover decorated with wispy lines resembling reeds and fronds; bound with red ribbon; variety of richly colored images inside, including beautiful women, insects, landscapes, birds, and men of different ages
markings: second to last page, top margin, black ink: [54 W 105th street / Kempf / M @ Kierusau (?)- Phone 4434 R / Number of house 293 Huntordoor (?)] and last page, in pencil: [L.C. Albertson / County Collector / Atlantic City N.J. / Will Crawford. W. 42. # 133]; various seals throughout
title: World of Art (Vol. 13)
